title: is this ban deserved?

You called for an ff 15 and the game went until 34 minutes.

To get banned you don't need to do something terrible or awful, you simply need to show that even after warning (14 day ban) you refuse to play nice with others, which you kinda did.

Calling people bad, saying "this is why your bronze". You are Bronze 1 with 500 games played... maybe keep your mouth closed...

nah soft ban, should get unbanned
Based on how toxic you were in the past, which put you on a hot list to ban you if you step over the line, this is fully deserved.
'how toxic i was in the past' i've had one warning lmao
